TextView.android:text: HectoClash is an interactive mental math game designed to provide an exciting and educational experience. Inspired by the Hectoc game format, HectoClash combines competitive gameplay with real-time duels, challenging players to solve mathematical puzzles under time constraints. This app is built to engage users, enhance their mental math skills, and foster a fun, learning-based community.

When user hits the Play button, a 6 digit sequence gets generated on which user has to perform four operations that are Addition(+), Subtraction(-), Multiplication(*) and Division(/) in order to get a result total of 100. The point scheme is as follows:
 
Right answer - 50 points Addition
Wrong answer - 20 points deduction
 
 User can play different modes such as Online Player, Custom Rooms, Level Player, Daily Challenges.
 This is a great game to improve Math Skills.
